definition: to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
China Council for the Promotion of International Trade (CCPIT)

containing_words.word: 中国国际贸易促进委员会

sentences.english: Use the concept map to promote dialogue and cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 运用概念图，促进对话与合作。

sentences.english: The positive self-concept will promote the individual mental health.
sentences.chinese: 积极的自我概念会促进个体的心理健康。

sentences.english: RESULTS Ischemia enhanced cell proliferation in DG of adult rats.
sentences.chinese: 结果缺血性脑损伤可促进成年大鼠齿状回的细胞增殖。

sentences.english: Over the past 10-plus years, the booming tourist industry has stimulated the Great wall's renovation project.
sentences.chinese: 十几年来，蓬勃发展的旅游业促进了长城的修缮工程。

sentences.english: The existence of large second phases is found to be beneficial to nucleation.
sentences.chinese: 粗大的第二相粒子对再结晶形核具有促进作用。

sentences.english: This need for speed has encouraged the development of digital transmission technology.
sentences.chinese: 提高速度的需要促进了数字传输技术的发展。

sentences.english: The promoters figured "peace" would link the anti-war sentiment to the rock concert.
sentences.chinese: 促进者们表示，“和平”将反战情绪带进摇滚音乐会。

sentences.english: As a special environment , education can promote the intell…
sentences.chinese: 教育作为特殊环境，对智力发展有促进作用。

sentences.english: The element K promotes the dissociation of acetylene on Ru(1010)surface.
sentences.chinese: 碱金属K的存在促进了乙炔的分解。

sentences.english: It can promote teacher's specialized knowledge through the development of music appreciation class.
sentences.chinese: 通过开发音乐欣赏课程促进了教师的专业成长。

sentences.english: The Chinese government has pledged to give the promotion of cross-Strait relations higher priority.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府保证会把促进两岸关系放在优先的位置上。

sentences.english: Health promotion activities conducted by health providers are not enough.
sentences.chinese: 医疗服务供给方健康促进工作不够。

sentences.english: FDI can promote the local industrial structure.
sentences.chinese: FDI可以促进地区性产业结构实现高度化。

sentences.english: SM promoted blood capillary, arteriole and venule form.
sentences.chinese: 能够促进毛细血管及新生小动脉形成。

sentences.english: It is an adaptogen, which means it build resistance to stress and boosts energy.
sentences.chinese: 它有抵抗压力促进能量产生的功效。

sentences.english: Ultimately, it is good for healthy and orderly development of Bayannur's small towns.
sentences.chinese: 最终促进巴彦淖尔市小城镇健康有序的发展。

definition: to induce/to promote/to urge/to impel/to bring about/to provoke/to drive (sb to do sth)/to catalyze/to actuate/to contribute to (some development)
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to promote/to enhance/to further/to advance (a cause etc)
to be beneficial/to be good for
